sentences: Orkuncan Işıtmak (born 8 January 1996), better known as Orkun Işıtmak, is a Turkish YouTuber known for producing a variety of videos.

After graduating from Governor Vecdi Gönül Anatolian High School, he enrolled in Istanbul University and moved to Istanbul, but later took a break from his education in order to spend more time on YouTube.
He founded his YouTube channel on 18 April 2010.

In 2012 he started shooting gaming and entertainment videos, but later his content diversified to include vlogs, broadcasts and interviews featuring with actors and singers, including Ece Seçkin, Murat Boz and Inna.
In 2018, he had his cinematic debut with a supporting role in the movie İyi Oyun.
